name: mini unicorn
notes:
a chonky little unicorn!

the pattern and tutorial is available here:
https://youtu.be/x3pp8fjh3b4

pattern details:
hook size: 3.5mm
yarn: 8ply
terms: us
difficulty: advanced beginner
finished size: 8cm

materials & supplies:
to make this pattern you will need:
• yarn
• scissors
• stitch markers
• needle
• pins
• stuffing
• 9mm safety eyes
